title: Tom McClintock
added: During the Covid-19 global pandemic, despite universal scientific agreement that cloth face masks reduce virus transmission, Tom McClintock expressed views that masks should not be required and wore a maks during congressional sessions stating "this mask is useless". <ref>{{Cite web|last=SFGATE|first=Eric Ting|date=2020-12-29|title=California GOP congressman blasts Gavin Newsom in the most ironic way possible|url=https://www.sfgate.com/politics/article/Tom-McClintock-2000-checks-Newsom-mask-Trump-600-15832711.php|access-date=2021-01-13|website=SFGATE|language=en-US}}</ref>

title: Tom McClintock
added: During the Covid-19 global pandemic, despite universal scientific agreement that cloth face masks reduce virus transmission, Tom McClintock expressed views that masks should not be required andtemporarilywore amaskduring congressional sessions stating "this mask is useless". <ref>{{Cite web|last=SFGATE|first=Eric Ting|date=2020-12-29|title=California GOP congressman blasts Gavin Newsom in the most ironic way possible|url=https://www.sfgate.com/politics/article/Tom-McClintock-2000-checks-Newsom-mask-Trump-600-15832711.php|access-date=2021-01-13|website=SFGATE|language=en-US}}</ref>
